rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area designed to maximize natural light with large windows and open layout. Incorporates Bohemian decor elements such as rustic furniture, vibrant textiles, and wall art. Vastu guidelines ensure that the entrance is properly aligned for positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-concept kitchen designed with functionality in mind. Features natural ventilation through windows placed per Vastu norms, ensuring that the cooking area gets ample fresh air and light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dining space integrated with the living room to create a seamless flow. Decorated with Bohemian accents and natural materials to maintain an organic feel.

rooms.name: Washroom
rooms.description: Compact washroom placed near the kitchen for convenience while following Vastu guidelines for placement of water elements.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance designed per Vastu guidelines to ensure proper entry of positive energy.
Large windows to enhance natural light and ventilation in the living area.
Strategically placed for optimal air circulation and adherence to Vastu principles.

additional_features.name: Rooftop Terrace
additional_features.description: An expansive terrace on the roof designed with Bohemian aesthetics featuring an outdoor seating area, planters, and retractable pergola for shade. Provides panoramic views of the surroundings while ensuring privacy.

additional_features.name: Split-Level Transition
additional_features.description: The design features a split-level arrangement that creates distinct zones between living and private spaces, enhancing the Bohemian aesthetic with unique staircases and transitional areas.
